title: Afreeca are, like, "Yes f*cking please"
body:
~~Give Afreeca the trophy now. Holy crap. We talk about freelo, but this is free Worlds.~~

~~Got hacked. Let's go EDG.~~

Got hacked. Let's go IG.

replies.body: You are being extremely bias. The players have put in so much efforts and time of their life; Inorder to win the title of world champion. To say that they dont care, and that is the reason why they've lost is just ridiculous. That theory only serves to console the weak and inept.

As long as it's an asian team right?

tbh I want a NONE ASIAN TEAM to win worlds for the first time in ages.

Well, I'm Australian first. So I want Dire Wolves to win - BUT WE KNOW THAT WON'T HAPPEN IN A BILLION FUCKIN' YEARS!

Then, I'm Korean.

Then, I'm Asian.

Once I've exhausted all those preferences, I'll move on being anti-NA.
